param.name: authors_module_category
param.label: Filter authors by root category
param.description: Select the root category for which you want to filter an author list. Select none to fetch authors from all categories.

param.name: home
param.label: Root label (e.g. Home)
param.description: The label for the 'home' link. Leave this blank if you don't wish to include a home link in your path.

param.name: seperator
param.label: Path separator
param.description: The path separator, e.g. a right arrow.

param.name: root_id
param.label: Select root category
param.description: Select the root category for which you want to create a category list. Select none to fetch a list of all categories.

param.name: end_level
param.label: Levels to render
param.description: Select the number of levels you wish to render. Leave this blank if you wish to render all the levels below the selected root category.

param.name: root_id2
param.label: Select root category
param.description: Select the root category for which you want to create a category drop-down list. Select none to create a drop-down list from all categories.

param.name: width
param.label: Search Box size
param.description: Size in characters for the search box

param.name: text
param.label: Text
param.description: Text to display in the search form

param.name: imagebutton
param.label: Search button as image
param.description: Use an image as the search button

param.name: min_size
param.label: Min font size (%)
param.description: Font size for less popular tags

param.name: max_size
param.label: Max font size (%)
param.description: Font size for most popular tags

param.name: cloud_limit
param.label: Tag limit (X most popular)
param.description: Select the X most popular tags to display.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
